meanings.sent1: She retakes the photo to make it better.
meanings.sent2: He often retakes his videos to improve them.
meanings.sent3: The cat retakes the same spot for its nap every day.
meanings.sent4: The student retakes the test, hoping for a higher score.
meanings.sent5: The chef retakes the cooking process to get the dish just right.

meanings.definition: An act of taking or filming again.
meanings.sent1: The director requested multiple retakes of the scene.
meanings.sent2: The retakes in the movie were necessary for perfection.
meanings.sent3: The retakes of the play made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The retakes of the song added depth to the final recording.
meanings.sent5: The retakes of the photo shoot captured the best moments.
